metadata.name: Suspicious Extrac32 Alternate Data Stream Execution
metadata.comment: Extract data from cab file and hide it in an alternate data stream

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('extrac32.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.cab')) AND process.cmd_line rlike ':\[^\\\\\]')

output.summary: Extract data from cab file and hide it in an alternate data stream
